AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.large white Ford pickup truck: vehicle that slowed dramatically, remained stopped at a stop sign for five seconds, and made an unusual turn, increasing reasonable suspicion due to its indirect travel route from Big Bend National Park to Alpine, Texas, and was stopped 70 or 80 miles from the United States/Mexican Border
